Reviews.Title: “Perfect Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bnana
Reviews.Content: ive tried 12 14 hotels paddington station hotel omega definitely ive stayed clean neat staff nice friendly quilts instead envelope sheets fight pillow seperated double cushion bathroom thats hotels clean towels day super clean hotel soundproof hear guests doors breakfast standard 6 flakes muesli etc choose beyond english breakfast location perfect bus subway nearby oxford st definitely choose hotel time london

Reviews.Content: traveling solo business tired paying exorbitant prices major chain hotels found hotel trip advisor chance marriott price value fantastic highly recommend hotel budget clean en suite facilities free hot cooked breakfast everyday included prices front reception 24 hours forgot pack electrical adapter hotel offered lend remember lift 4th floor bit climb exercise bathroom private plusses location block paddington station price cleanliness quiet allows night’s sleep rate hotel highly expectations negative score sizes misleading paying wifi tv figure power button select channel plenty channel selections overall experience
